column5: Gillian and I just put up our Christmas tree yesterday. Out first ever Christmas tree infact.  (tree is Mexico and the BVI are a little costly and hard to come by)  At first glance it is jsut like any other Christmas tree...    But upon closer inspection there are numerous fishing lures through out the tree      And of course, a Mepps spinner...     Everyone else have their tree or Festivus pole already?
Check out the contest area about TJQ's christmas tree contest Mepps.
I think TJ has a couple more lures then me! haha!
Well break out the tackle box Mepps, lets get this competition going  Joey
I just bought my tree today, she goes up tomorrow.  Nice job on the tree guys!
Ours is traditional      Molly guarding the presents    Whopper
Thats a beautiful tree!  I would love one that size, but our apartment is small.  Ours is a little over 5 feet tall.

Wow Phil, that's a great tree!  But what's that on the chair??? lol  Hey Mepss, you know you're a die hard fisherman when you use lures for your decorations...lol... Good on you and Gillian.  I don't have one, haven't for almost 10 yrs now.  Not much point , I rarely get any company, and between the dogs and cats, a tree wouldn't last long here  Maureen
Dear Santa Mepps,  I would like a fish hook neclace like yours.  Thanks Santa!
Remind me again before we cross paths and I wil have one for you!
I think your cat is starting to loose its hair
